Sources:

Video: Semir 1080p Main, around MRG and LotterY  thx guys

Audio: Sweet Line Big Thx to S4NDM4N

Notes:	

This movie is complete from start to finish with aftercredits scene, all english and perfect line.

Could have done a nice ts-release on day 1, but the semir cam was missing last 18mins of the movie,bummer
Was hoping someone would step up and go camming that last mins, but nobody wanted to go, this is such a big movie and they all denied.
really dont understand the problem, waited 4 days nothing from russian,nothing from spanish, nothing from italy so only lottery did cam it.
lottery cam its pretty much same like the missing scenes on minions, a bit unsharp, but watchable
they all decided to release the movie without the last 18mins, bollox
mrg did a nice job on muxing things together, but without fixing ar and perspective and with cam audio i cant watch that.
ted needs some line to let you understand what he is talking, i wouldnt watch anything less than my version.

Theire wont be coming another cam,
Next is the korean web-dl which is due in 2-3 weeks, but it will feature subs and worst of all it will be censored.
and ted is all about swearing and that censored is unwatchable, i gladly pass on that, i wanna see it all
so i had to step up and finish the job now.


Encode:

took me 2 days to get in done, awful lot of work
the main hdcam is semir which is quite nice, needed splitting in parts and fixing perspective when needed
removed some flicker and it needed brightening up and fixing the colours,
upfront 1min was missing, had to use lottery video for that,
cause it is a needed scene, also the narrative voice is talking the intro for the movie, cant be missed.
last 18mins is from lottery cam too, fixed perspective and ar on that too, got quite nice consider the source(pics included)

Audio was another perfect line through and through, very professional

all in all its a good watch and will do me till retail.
got very nice
enjoy

Video: 720x304 @bitrate 1500 2pass
Audio: English Line Stereo 2.0
Sample: yes included

PS: terminator is next

Plot

Newlywed couple Ted and Tami-Lynn want to have a baby, but in order to qualify to be a parent, 
Ted will have to prove he's a person in a court of law.
